special_text:
[+2]: Add {R} or {G}. If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, add {R}{G} instead.
[-1]: Domri deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of land cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
[-10]: Domri deals 10 damage to each of up to one target player, up to one target creature without flying and up to one target creature with flying.
